description.translate: O hard evening, may I look forward to defeat you and to deliver your corpse to the night.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Haute Miauletère\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Ô dure soirée, qu'il me tarde de te vaincre\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et délivrer ton cadavre à la nuit.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7O hard evening, may I look forward to defeat\"}","{\"text\":\"§7you and to deliver your corpse to the night.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7SPD§a1 §7DAR§a1 §7LUC§a1 §7HUN§c-1\"}"]}}
